2019-2020 Free and Reduced Price School Meals Applications

a.title: The special eduation annual notice to parents is available in the Resources section of the Special Education site

li.a: Special Education Annual Notice to Parents

a.title: Click on link to access site

div.p: Paper packets are being prepared by staff on Tuesday 4/28 and Wednesday 4/29 for delivery by school bus on Thursday 4/30. The paper packets include work for the two school weeks starting on May 4, 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Sullivan County - Packet Deliveries Round 2

div.p: Grab and Go Breakfast and Lunch will be available Tuesdays and Fridays from 11:00am - 12:30pm at D&D Brew Works in Laporte. Students do not need to be present to receive a meal.

a.title: Go to comments for Grab and Go Meals

img.alt: Sullivan County School District Mobile Technology Helpdesk

a.span: Sullivan County School District Mobile Technology Helpdesk

div.p: Spare Chromebooks and chargers are available at D&D Brewworks in Laporte on Fridays from 12 PM to 1 PM. Students needing to replace a broken Chromebook should bring their Chromebook and charger to D&D for replacement. Reminder that Grab and Go Meals are served from 11 AM to 12:30 PM so you can access both from 12 PM to 12:30 PM.

a.title: Go to comments for Sullivan County School District Mobile Technology Helpdesk

div.p: The recording of the Sullivan County School District April 28, 2020 Committee of the Whole meeting is available at https://youtu.be/57E3E8MqDKs.

a.title: Go to comments for School Board Meeting - Recording

a.span: Sullivan County School District Social Media

div.p: In addition to our website, you can keep track of important covid-19 response information from the Sullivan County School District on social media. Check out our Youtube Channel and Facebook Page

a.title: Go to comments for Sullivan County School District Social Media

a.span: Sullivan County - Continuity of Education Plan and Resources

div.p: The Sullivan County School District continues to respond to the Covid-19 based school closure. Collected materials can be found at https://www.sulcosd.k12.pa.us/covid19. Mrs. Cross provides details of the plan in her March 30th letter which you can find on that page or directly by clicking here.

a.title: Go to comments for Sullivan County - Continuity of Education Plan and Resources

p.strong: Online Free and Reduced Price Meal Application new for the 2019-2020 School Year!

span.p: The Free and Reduced Price Meal Application is available at www.paschoolmeals.com . Students will be given program information at the start of the school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Online Free and Reduced Price Meal Application

p.strong: To find a meal site near you during the summer months:

strong.em: NOTE: Sites are added and removed throughout the summer. Please check back often for updated information.

a.title: Go to comments for Summer Food Service Program
